import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

def calculate_averages(pints, propindic, variances):
    propavg = []
    for pint in pints:
        avg = np.average(propindic[pint])
        propavg.append([pint, avg])
    propavg_df = pd.DataFrame(propavg, columns=['ProbInt', 'FracIn'])
    avgvar = np.average(variances)
    propavg_df[''] = [avgvar if pd.isna(x) else x for x in propavg_df['FracIn']]
    return propavg_df

        propavg.append([pint, avg])
    propavg_df = pd.DataFrame(propavg, columns=['', 'FracIn'])
    avgvar = np.average(variances)
    propavg_df['FracIn'] = [avgvar if pd.isna(x) else x for x in propavg_df['FracIn']]
    return propavg_df

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

def calculate_averages(pints, propindic, variances):
    propavg = []
    for pint in pints:
        avg = np.average(propindic[pint])
        propavg.append([pint, avg])
    propavg_df = pd.DataFrame(propavg, columns=['ProbInt', 'FracIn'])
    avgvar = np.average(variances)
    propavg_df['FracIn'] = [avgvar if pd.isna(x) else x for x in propavg_df['']]
    return propavg_df
